"Slice and Dice" - A kitchen gadget that can cut vegetables and fruits into perfect slices, julienne strips, or waffle cuts with the touch of a button. It can also create different textures and patterns based on the user's preference.
"Smart Scale" - A kitchen gadget that can measure ingredients accurately and quickly. It can convert different units of measurement and even suggest recipes based on the ingredients available.
"Food Scraper" - A kitchen gadget that can scrape food waste from cutting boards, plates, and bowls. It can then turn the scraps into compost or fertilizer for plants.
"Food Pairer" - A kitchen gadget that can suggest complementary ingredients and flavors based on the food being cooked. It can also provide recipe ideas and nutritional information.

"Food Steamer" - A kitchen gadget that can steam food quickly and easily. It can also infuse different flavors into the food and make it healthier. The steamer can be adjusted to different levels of steaming based on the type of food being cooked.
